ai-patthana21.12:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana21.12:0.3_0: Next there are bartered out the interior.
ai-patthana21.12:1.1_0: Not seeing the teaching, they don’t see, the cause or condition for perception.
ai-patthana21.12:9.1_0: He is not skilled in brief, skilled in detail, and skilled in brief.
ai-patthana21.12:11.1_0: (This is not the same thing as the previous discourse.)
